Name: Furi
About the game: You were captured. Look what they’ve done to you… The jailer is the key, kill him and you’ll be free. Fight your way free in this ultra-responsive, fast-paced sword fighting and dual-stick shooting game. Boss design by Takashi Okazaki. Original soundtrack by Carpenter Brut, Danger, The Toxic Avenger, Lorn, Scattle, Waveshaper and Kn1ght!
Meta Title: Furi: Jul 5, 2016, The Game Bakers and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Furi? Check out the release date (Jul 5, 2016), developer insights from The Game Bakers, and a complete game summary.
